casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Kimani I. STERLING, Appellant. WD 80759 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: July 3, 2018
Rehearing Denied July 31, 2018 Joshua D. Hawley, Attorney General, and Daniel N. McPherson, Assistant Attorney General, Jefferson City, MO, Attorneys for Respondent. Nancy A. McKerrow, Columbia, MO, Attorney for Appellant. Before Special Division: Mark D. Pfeiffer, Presiding Judge, and Lisa White Hardwick and Cynthia L. Martin, Judges

Order

Per Curiam:

Mr. Kimani Sterling appeals from the Judgment of the Circuit Court of Jackson County, Missouri, finding him guilty, following a jury trial, of murder in the second degree and armed criminal action. Because a published opinion would have no precedential value, a memorandum of law has been provided to the parties. The judgment is affirmed. Rule 30.25(b).
